annonstext:
We are looking for driven part time students to help our customer success team in day to day customer interactions. You should have a passion for business, and be service minded. We are a small team, and you would work closely with our other team members as well as interact directly with our customers.

After some time with us, you will learn how to work with credit applications and gain a good understanding of the credit process.

We expect that you are currently studying but that you should be able to work at least 2 days per week.

What we offer:

- Interesting and developing business oriented tasks

- Flexible work hours (half days, flexible weekly schedules)

- Flexible work location, work from home or in the office

- Fast learning curve, learn from the experienced experts in a small team

About Mynt:

Mynt is a fast growing Fintech company based in Stockholm. In 2020, Mynt launched its next generation corporate card. A solution for business to empower their employees, gain control of spend and cash management, and simplify expense management. Mynt has a vision to help solve financial pain points for small businesses and to become the next generation bank for European SMEs.
